data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 6,125 believers in Centro Sur against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Centro Sur, Equatorial Guinea
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Centro Sur, Equatorial Guinea the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Over 10.73 percent of the people of Centro Sur are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Centro Sur to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Acurenam
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Acurenam, Centro Sur, Equatorial Guinea.
Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 109,564 cultural Christians in the state of Centro Sur to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Centro Sur. Through your servants plant 25 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.section_summary:
the state of Centro Sur, Equatorial Guinea has a population of 129,600.

We estimate Centro Sur has 6,125 people who might know Jesus, 109,564 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 13,911 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 21 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Centro Sur, Equatorial Guinea to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.
